Content.summary: 'Hong Van Four chilli rated' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about London, Hong Van, Business Finance written on 19 November 2006
Content.tags: London, Hong Van, Vietnamese, Bun bo Hue
Content.bodyText:
Visited: 18/11/2006

Four chilli rated

80 Lee High Road, London, SE13 5PT

Hong Van was recommended to us by someone who had seen our previous reviews, so we dutifully headed south of the river.

The stock was amazing. This was the first time that we haven't added chilli sauce to a stock. It could have been a little more fragrant but that would be being very fussy.

Good for: Awesome chilli kick and very reasonably priced.
Bad for: Not the nicest looking beef, and not really enough of it either.

Still using the stationery of the previous owners....
